body_html:
I think the following would be much more efficient, though I haven't actually run them.

from torch.nn import init

self.lambda = nn.Embedding(num_elms, K)
init.constant(self.lambda.weight.data, val=-10)

Or,

self.lambda = nn.Embedding(num_elms, K)
self.lambda.weight.data.fill_(-10)

body:
I think the following would be much more efficient, though I haven't actually run them.
```
from torch.nn import init

self.lambda = nn.Embedding(num_elms, K)
init.constant(self.lambda.weight.data, val=-10)
```
Or,
```
self.lambda = nn.Embedding(num_elms, K)
self.lambda.weight.data.fill_(-10)
```
